--- layout: default --- # What is a Skill?

Opinionated Markdown Files

  • A structured way to format documentation that agents can understand

Self-Discovery

  • Agent can discover and acquire processes within the skill on-demand

Becoming Standard

  • Anthropic recently released this structure - it's becoming the standard

Not Complicated

  • You already have the knowledge - skills just encode it properly

tool_input.content:
--- layout: default ---
What is a Skill?

Opinionated Markdown

The Format

  • Structured documentation files
  • Designed for agent consumption
  • Human-readable too

Self-Discovery

The Magic

  • Agents find processes on-demand
  • No manual loading required
  • Context acquired as needed

Becoming Standard

The Trend

  • Released by Anthropic
  • Adopted across AI coding tools
  • The de facto approach

--- layout: default ---
What is a Skill?

Opinionated Markdown

The Format

  • Structured documentation files
  • Designed for agent consumption
  • Human-readable too

Self-Discovery

The Magic

  • Agents find processes on-demand
  • No manual loading required
  • Context acquired as needed

Becoming Standard

  • The de facto approach

+
What is a Skill?
-      <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-lg bg-blue-500 flex items-center justify-center">
-        <svg class="w-8 h-8 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+<div class="bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-50 to-gray-100 px-5 py-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg border-1 border-gray-400">
+    <div class="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg bg-blue-500 flex items-center justify-center">
+      <svg class="w-6 h-6 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">

-
  • A structured way to format documentation that agents can understand
-      <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-lg bg-purple-500 flex items-center justify-center">
-        <svg class="w-8 h-8 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">

-
  • Agent can discover and acquire processes within the skill on-demand

+

The Format
-      <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-lg bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-500 to-red-500 flex items-center justify-center">
-        <svg class="w-8 h-8 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+<div class="bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-50 to-gray-100 px-5 py-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg border-1 border-gray-400">
+    <div class="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg bg-purple-500 flex items-center justify-center">
+      <svg class="w-6 h-6 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">

-
  • Anthropic recently released this structure - it's becoming the standard

+

The Magic
-      <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-lg bg-green-500 flex items-center justify-center">
-        <svg class="w-8 h-8 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+<div class="bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-50 to-gray-100 px-5 py-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg border-1 border-gray-400">
+    <div class="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg bg-orange-500 flex items-center justify-center">
+      <svg class="w-6 h-6 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">

-
  • You already have the knowledge - skills just encode it properly

+

The Trend
-SPEAKER NOTES (Skills Section Start - ~5 min mark, 5-7 min for this section):

-So what IS a skill? It's an opinionated way of formatting Markdown files that allows AI agents to self-discover processes. Think of it like documentation that the AI can actually use. Anthropic recently released this as a standard structure in Claude Code, and it's becoming the de facto way to encode engineering knowledge for AI. The good news? It's not complicated to set up - if you've ever written documentation for a new hire, you've already done 80% of the work.
+So what IS a skill? It's opinionated markdown files - structured documentation designed for agents to understand, but still human-readable too.
-NOTE: Keep skills section light touch - 5-7 minutes total for slides 07-10.
+The magic is self-discovery. Agents can find and acquire processes on-demand without you manually loading context. They pull in what they need, when they need it.
+And this is becoming the standard. Anthropic released this structure with Claude Code, and now many AI coding providers have adopted it as the way to structure agentic documentation.
